data.actual_result: You are unable to select them making it impossible to disable new member messages and AFK channels
data.expected_result: You should be able to select the "No New Member Messages" and "No AFK Channel" options
data.short_description: It is impossible to disable new member messages or AFK channels
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a server that you have the Manage Server permission for - Go to Server Settings > Overview - Open the selection menu for New Member Messages Channel or AFK Channel and notice that the "No New Member Messages" and "No AFK Channel" options are not present
